description.value: This subflow will be triggered by the 'create a new DKIM' button on the domains - overview page. It will create a new DKIM key and insert the record into the DNS records table.
description.display_value: This subflow will be triggered by the 'create a new DKIM' button on the domains - overview page. It will create a new DKIM key and insert the record into the DNS records table.
